ShowName: Developing Games with Marmalade and C++ for Windows and Windows Phone
VideoTitle: Developing Games with Marmalade and C++ for Windows and Windows Phone: (02) Building the Gameplay
Author: JeffKoch
Description: See the game you'll be building throughout the session, using Marmalade C++, and explore how to build and deploy the game onto Windows devices.

ShowName: Developing Games with Marmalade and C++ for Windows and Windows Phone
VideoTitle: Developing Games with Marmalade and C++ for Windows and Windows Phone: (03) Cloud Services
Author: JeffKoch
Description: See how easy is to create a single cloud backend to your game and to include features, such as a leaderboard. Explore and sign up for GameSparks.

ShowName: Developing Games with Marmalade and C++ for Windows and Windows Phone
VideoTitle: Developing Games with Marmalade and C++ for Windows and Windows Phone: (04) Monetization
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Look at best practices for monetization, engagement, and retention of players of your games, and check out ways to enhance game sales.

ShowName: Developing Games with Marmalade and C++ for Windows and Windows Phone
VideoTitle: Developing Games with Marmalade and C++ for Windows and Windows Phone: (05) Creating Marmalade Extensions
Author: JeffKoch
Description: See demos on how to build Marmalade extensions for both Windows Phone and Windows 8.

ShowName: Developing Games with Marmalade and C++ for Windows and Windows Phone
VideoTitle: Developing Games with Marmalade and C++ for Windows and Windows Phone: (06) Packaging and Finishing Touches
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Revisit the best practices from Module 4, and implement those key features into the game using extensions and Marmalade SDKs. Package and publish the game to Windows 8 and Windows Phone stores.
